titles.title: Deploying American Blockchains Act of 2025
Deploying American Blockchains Act of 2025
Deploying American Blockchains Act of 2025

A bill to require the Secretary of Commerce support the leadership of the United States with respect to the deployment, use, application, and competitiveness of blockchain technology, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.
Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.
Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs. Hearings held.
Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation. Reported by Senator Cruz without amendment. With written report No. 119-84.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 195.

committee.name: Senate Commerce, Science, and Transportation
committee.activity: Reported By, Markup By, Referred To

committee.name: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs
